title: CBS Radio Mystery Theater and Five Minute Mysteries
description: https://www.podtrac.com/pts/redirect.mp3/archive.org/download/rr12021/CaseClosed750.mp3  Case Closed begins with the CBS Radio Mystery Theater this week. We hear A Little Night Murder, from March 13, 1974. (52:00) Our second story is Death On A Train, from the December 22, 1947, episode of Five Minute Mysteries. Download CaseClosed750
content:encoded:
Case Closed begins with the CBS Radio Mystery Theater this week. We hear A Little Night Murder, from March 13, 1974.

(52:00) Our second story is Death On A Train, from the December 22, 1947, episode of Five Minute Mysteries.

Download CaseClosed750
